data.title: SC Awards 2010: And the nominees areâ€¦
data.meta_description: The winners of the prestigious 2010 SC Awards U.S. will be announced on March 2 in San Francisco.
data.text:
The annual SC Awards U.S. honor those companies and individuals whose innovative products, and services have most strongly contributed to the vitality of the IT security industry here in North America.

While we honor the best in the Western Hemisphere, our colleagues in London will hold a similar event on April 27 to bestow recognition on European contenders.

With the readers of SC Magazine and a distinguished judging panel having made their selections, we present for

the first time in 2009, the finalists for the Reader Trust, Excellence and Professional categories.

SC Awards Gala: Where it's at

The gala dinner and ceremony will take place in San Francisco on Tuesday, March 2. For more information about the SC Awards event, please contact Natasha Mulla at: (646) 638-6108 or natasha.mulla@

haymarketmedia.com.

Judges, co-chairs

Illena Armstrong, editor-in-chief, SC Magazine

Greg Bell, global services leader, information protection and business resiliency, KPMG

Stacey Halota, VP, information security and privacy, The Washington Post Co.
